# Date.ISO8601FormatStyle.TimeSeparator.omitted

**Case**

Specifies no separator between the time components in an ISO 8601 date format style.

## Declaration

```swift
case omitted
```

## Discussion

The rawValue of `omitted` is an empty string (””).

## Specifying ISO 8601 Format Style Time Separators

- **Date.ISO8601FormatStyle.TimeSeparator.colon**: Specifies a colon character separating the time components in an ISO 8601 date format style.
